imdb.plot outline: A collection of lightly linked short films of the bizarre, the crazy and the downright mind-bending. Using Urban Legends, What If Scenarios and Cautionary Tales as a basis; The Grey Area tells the stories of infinity, stories that tell a lesson and explore the darker side of humanity. Where the devil can be a mentor and a man will desperately try to change the life he left behind. Stories where anything is possible.
imdb.title: The Grey Area
plot: There are stories that hide in the dark; ones we do not speak of in polite conversation. These Urban Legends, Cautionary Tales and scenarios that ask us, "What If?" are real. Welcome to _The Grey Area_ (qv).::Leon Films [gb]

A collection of lightly linked short films of the bizarre, the crazy and the downright mind-bending. Using Urban Legends, What If Scenarios and Cautionary Tales as a basis; _The Grey Area_ (qv) tells the stories of infinity, stories that tell a lesson and explore the darker side of humanity. Where the devil can be a mentor and a man will desperately try to change the life he left behind. Stories where anything is possible.::Leon Films [gb]
